item.title: Date and Wheaten Scones
item.description: Ingredients: 10 oz (284g) wholemeal flour 4 oz (113g) plain flour 1 tsp salt 3 tsp baking powder 1 tsp baking soda 4 oz (113g) butter 2 oz (57g) granulated sugar 1 egg beaten 8 fl (237ml) buttermilk all conversions are approximate Method: Preheat oven to 220 C gas 7 Mix all dry ingredients into a bowl, then rub in butter with your fingers until it resembles a crumble.
